attributes.action: stop the plans to extend school days to 9 hours a day
attributes.additional_details: The goverment is planning to make children go to school for nine hours a day (9am-6pm). Also cutting down the number of school holidays they have a year from 13 weeks to just 7 weeks! During winter months children will be travelling home in the dark, pupils also cannot focus for roughly 8 hours, therefore this plan should not go ahead!  SIGN THE PETITION!
